title: More Bad News (1988) [AppleTV] [mp4]
description:
The Comic Strip Presents #18: More Bad News

Hilarious mockumentary about a crap british heavy metal band. Movie was in production at the same time as "This Is Spinal Tap", which received far greater critical acclaim. 

Its members are Vim Fuego (aka Alan Metcalfe), vocals and lead guitar (played by Adrian Edmondson); Den Dennis, rhythm guitar (Nigel Planer); Colin Grigson, bass (Rik Mayall); and Spider Webb, drums (Peter Richardson).
Featuring members of the Young Ones
